plugins.name: altoindex
plugins.description: Work with your Apple Notes, Apple Reminders, Apple Calendar, iMessage, Safari, Apple Contacts, Voice Memos, and Granola data synced by alto.index. Includes native app deep links back to every item.

plugins.name: tinydot
plugins.description: Draft, edit, review, import, and publish content on tinydot sites through natural conversation. Import external websites, work with tinydot markdown, wikilinks, embeds, frontmatter, and site customization.
